techmeme.title: Current and former Tesla staff: self-driving data annotation staff were told to prioritize analyzing car data of VIP drivers, like Elon Musk and YouTube stars (Grace Kay/Business Insider)
Sources: xAI ends talks with Oracle to expand an existing arrangement to rent Nvidia chips; source: Oracle is not part of xAI's supercomputer project in Memphis (Aaron Holmes/The Information)
Google begins rolling out speedometers in Google Maps for iOS and CarPlay globally, more than five years after adding the features to the Android app (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Illinois enacted new rules in its Child Labor Law on July 1 to mandate influencer parents pay their under-16 kids for appearing in their social media content (Chris Morris/Fortune)
Austin-based Command Zero, which uses automation and LLMs to help with cybersecurity investigations, emerges from stealth with $21M in seed funding led by a16z (Ionut Arghire/SecurityWeek)
